text: Recombinant <extra_id_0> NFAT5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( amino acids 175-471 ) with an N-terminal 6x His tag was expressed in E . coli BL21 ( DE3 ) cells ( Stratagene ; www.stratagene.com ) and purified under native conditions using Ni-NTA agarose ( Qiagen ) .
Recombinant <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were purchased ( Active Motif , www.activemotif.com ) .
Quantitative <extra_id_0> DNase I <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> footprinting was performed as previously described [ 31 ] .
